Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>
StartController to make model Classes and view Classes communicate is singleton implements EvenHandler
Since:
1.0

      public void updateTime​(double time, Color c)

      public java.lang.String secondsToFormattedString​(double time)

    • addPgnToDisplay

      public void addPgnToDisplay​(java.lang.String s)
      Used for writing into the Textarea next to the Chessboard. should be used to write the move that has just been played in PGN notation into the TextArea makes a newLine in TextArea after a full turn
      Parameters:
      s - String to write into TextArea
